Topic.Title: I keep getting the same error just trying to name my adventure

I just created Quest text adventure online, and it works fine for me.

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/9n1ndd8ugugfaqfnbs4x_q/02272021-tester

---
I also tested my ability to create a Quest game in the web browser nearly a week ago, and it worked for me then, as well.

Today I made a text adventure.  Last time, I made a gamebook.

Also, I am using Firefox on Linux, just for the record.

I wonder why it works for some of us but not for all of us?
